title: Deutsch Direkt! Eps. 11-20
brief_description: This second set of video programs in the German language course continues to build on the vocabulary of the first ten programs, whilst introducing new vocabulary. Each program also includes a look at a different aspect of life in Germany or Austria. Introduced by Hanni Vanhaiden. A workbook and audio-cassettes are also available for use with the videos.
